Package edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.nlp.agreement

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotatorAgreement
    This abstract class and its descendants are based on the survey article "Inter-Coder Agreement for Computational Linguistics" by Ron Artstein and Massimo Poessio in Computational Lingusitics, Volume 34, Number 4.
    FleissMultiPi  
    PairwiseAgreement  
    PairwiseBennettS
    This coefficient is computed by assuming that each label is equally likely.
    PairwiseCohensKappa  
    PairwiseScottsPi
    This assumes that all annotators have the expected distribution for random assignment of labels.
